sense.def: Illness Sign identical with da bian mi 大便秘① , constipation. Qi xiao liang fang 奇效良方 3 Recipe Entry sao feng san 搜風散 , powder to sweep away wind: 治風氣，中脘不利，大便閉澀 , “It cures wind qi, with a blocked passage in the central duct and constipation with roughness ”.
